oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Slide Collection - Street Scene, Fourth Avenue North at Union Street
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Life & Casualty Building towers over historic buildings situated along Fourth Avenue North. The west side of the street between Church and Union Streets was home to clothing and shoe stores such as Steins and Burton Chambers, both men's clothing stores, and Roberts women's clothing store. 35mm
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Life & Casualty
Capital City; Business; Popular culture; Shopping; Architecture; Buildings
Nashville (Tenn.); Fourth Avenue North; Church Street; union Street
